name: 陳匡正
objective: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1)IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2)Anglo-American Contract Law, (3)Definition, Regulation, Types & Management of IP License, (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)Technical Cooperation Contract, (6)IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association. In fact, the class lectures will be in English 30% and in Chinese 70%, and the class materials are mainly in Chinese.
schedule:
Week 1 (113/9/9~113/9/14) Introduction of the Classes and Materials
Week 2 (113/9/16~113/9/21) Intellectual Property Business Models
Week 3 (113/9/23~113/9/28) Anglo-American Contract Law (I)
Week 4 (113/9/30~113/10/5) Anglo-American Contract Law (II) 
Week 5 (113/10/7~113/10/12) Licensing Agreements for Intellectual Property: Contents
Week 6 (113/10/14~113/10/19) Licensing Agreements for Intellectual Property: Management
Week 7 (113/10/21~113/10/26) Standard Essential Patents (I)
Week 8 (113/10/28~113/11/2) Standard Essential Patents (II)
Week 9 (113/11/4~113/11/9) Mid-Term Week/A Week's Classes Suspension
Week 10 (113/11/11~113/11/16) FRAND Terms (I) 
Week 11 (113/11/18~113/11/23) FRAND Terms (II) 
Week 12 (113/11/25~113/11/30) European Unitary Patent System 
Week 13 (113/12/2~113/12/7) Trademark and Copyright Licensing Agreements; Trade Secrets Using Contracts
Week 14 (113/12/9~113/12/14) Joint Venture, Merger, and Technical Cooperation Contracts
Week 15 (113/12/16~113/12/21) Final Week/A Week's Classes Suspension
Week 16 (113/12/23~113/12/28) Final Project Report (I); Hand in the Class Notes
Week 17 (113/12/30~114/1/4) Final Project Report (II); Hand in the Class Notes
Week 18 (114/1/6~114/1/11) Winter Vacation

name: 蘇倚德
objective:
本課程將探討 (1) 智財商業模式與智財交易 (2) 英美契約法 (3) 智財授權契約規範 (4) 授權程序與稽核 (5) 技術合作契約 (6) 智財合資契約及章程
This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4) License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.
schedule:
第一週 課程及教材介紹
第二週 智財商業模式、英美契約法 (1/2)
第三週 英美契約法 (3/4)
第四週 專題演講及案例討論
第五週 專題演講及案例討論
第六週 專題演講及案例討論
第七週 期中週
第八週 智財授權契約之內容與管理
第九週 智財授權程序及稽核
第十週 標準必要專利
第十一週 歐洲單一專利制度
第十二週 FRAND 授權條款
第十三週 商標授權契約、著作授權契約及營業秘密使用契約實務
第十四週 智財合資契約、併購契約與技術合作契約
第十五週 期末週 
第十六週 期末報告
第十七週 期末報告
第十八週 寒假
